name: FunFair-Shooter! (TriJam#189)
description:
Push and Pull (TriJam#189)

Welcome to your first FunFair-Bow-Shooting-Range-Billard-Bowling-Minigolf-Simulator!

PUSH the button to start the level
PULL the string to shoot (read below)

Move your shooter with A and D.

To aim:
Press and hold the left button.
Move the mouse left-right to set direction
and up-down to pull the string to give your shot some power!

Made in 3 hours for TriJam#189 in a Team of two:
Coding: Grisgram
Visuals: elKortes

This game features online-highscores through my cloud-api. I developed it for a bigger project I am working on, but it is so easy to implement, that I thought, I give it a try in a Jam-submission! Have fun - Gris
